attributes.action: Theresa May: Reverse the crippling cuts to local government
attributes.additional_details: In Eastbourne this has amounted to a savage reduction of almost 60% of the grant - £6m p/a. We call upon Eastbourne’s MP and MPs from across the country to lobby the Prime Minister and the government for a better settlement and to continue to do so until such time that funding for local authoroties reaches the level it was pre-2015. Whilst the petition originates in Eastbourne, it draws attention to the impact of government grant cuts to local authorities across England.
attributes.background: In recent years annual reductions in the grant paid by central government have crippled local authorities’ ability to respond effectively to local needs. Local government has borne a disproportionate share of central government’s austerity measures and it is now time to say "no more".
